kpi.name: M5012C2

kpi_info.title: NUMBER OF AVAILABLE R99 SUBUNITS IN FSM
kpi_info.use: "The number of the available subunits for R99 Channel Elements in the FSM. The counter indicates the minimum value of HW capacity and licensed capacity available for R99 CE in the FSM. The licensed capacity considered in this counter is the sum of: - number of dedicated R99 CE licenses from all LCGs present in FSM, - R99 CE capacity of hybrid HSUPA resource steps which is allocated to the HSUPA schedulers present in FSM, - total number of licensed R99 CEs in the common baseband pool. Current usage of the common pool is not considered. UPDATED: The counter is updated when FSM configuration, HW capacity or licensed capacity is changed."

kpi.kpi_alias: NUMBER OF AVAILABLE R99 SUBUNITS IN FSM
